# What you need to do now:

* Open RStudio

* Install `shiny`

``` {r, eval=FALSE}
  install.packages("shiny")
  library(shiny)
```

* Open a new `shiny` file

  * _File -> New File -> Shiny Web App..._

* Pick a name (maybe your own?) and chose the single file option
